snippet.title: Stardew Valley Expanded Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a fanmade expansion mod for ConcernedApe's Stardew Valley, my favorite game in the world. The release of this trailer marks the conclusion of over three years of my life I've dedicated to expanding a world that captivated me. I aim to give you, the player, that sense of adventure and unknown once more. Through this mod, my aim is to immerse you in the world ConcernedApe created. 

Download the mod: https://www.nexusmods.com/stardewvalley/mods/3753
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FlashShifter
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/StardewValleyExpanded
Partake in the Reddit community: https://www.reddit.com/r/StardewValleyExpanded/
Join the Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/svexpanded
